title: Saturn Transit in the 6th House for Gemini Ascendant
summary: Saturn transiting the sixth house strengthens discipline in work, health, and problem-solving. Challenges increase but so does endurance. This phase favors structured routines, service-oriented roles, and steady improvement through persistence. Enemies, debts, or health issues can be managed successfully with consistency. Avoid burnout by balancing duty with recovery.

sections.heading: Career
points: Service, compliance, or technical roles favored

sections.heading: Finance
points: Expenses linked to health or tools

sections.heading: Mental / Inner State
points: Risk of fatigue if rest is ignored

closing: This transit rewards persistence and discipline. Sustainable routines turn challenges into long-term victories.
